page.title: 15A DAY IN ZOE'S LIFE.
page.content: My name is{Zoe Harte.}I am 11 years old and I live in Lamb Cottage in Howe Street.I go to{Ford End School. Each morning I am picked up by the school bus.When we get into school we have half an hour quiet reading. The day I am describing is Monday. First we have Savings which people save in a Post Office account,also the children that have dinners give in their money.After that we do some maths or langauge or perhaps some drawing or a painting. After assembly we do much the same. We finish school at 3:15 and I go home on the school bus.
